title: Integrative Digestive Disorders Care
description: Learn more about our services in Northern California and how we partner with you to create personalized care.
cleaned_text: Your gut is, literally and figuratively, the engine of a healthy body. When your digestive system is out of balance, you may need more than a simple antacid or a course of antibiotics to feel better. Integrative and holistic practitioners in the Sutter Health network specialize in using a whole-body approach to identify and treat disorders of the gut, from autoimmune conditions such as celiac disease and Crohn's to unidentified ailments that keep you from effectively processing and eliminating nutrients. We consider the full range of conventional medical therapies and complementary healing approaches to address your needs. Our team can help you with conditions including: - Abdominal pain - Bloating and gas - Celiac disease - Constipation - Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis - Diarrhea - Gastroenteritis - GERD/acid reflux - Gluten sensitivity - Intestinal microbial overgrowth - Intestinal yeast (candida) - Irritable bowel syndrome - Lactose intolerance - Leaky gut syndrome - Weight gain
